main.name: Juan Mario Parra D'Errico
main.bio: Highly enthusiastic Computer engineer with 8 month of experience in web development. He always learning the best practices to improve solutions as a professional, He really enjoy explorer new technologies, standards and methods that allow him to develop modern and powerful applications. He really like being able to understand the problems to provide an optimal solution, He always willing to learn more, since curiosity is a quality that characterizes him because he always want to know in an integral, specific and general way about some software that wants to be developed.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to contact me for a project request.

education.description: Develop applications in web environments under the Front end and Back end approach for the development of dynamic websites with updated technological tools.

trained for the diagnosis of information needs in organizations and the design and implementation of automated systems aimed at providing, in a reliable and timely manner, the information required for decision making at the tactical, strategic and operational levels

work.title: Freelancer React Developer
work.description: • Look for improvements to the code .• Create new components from previous ones to have a more organized.• Develop project concepts and maintain optimal workflow.• Work with senior developer to manage large, complex design project corporate clients.• Solve issues spotted by the QA team.

work.title: FullStack Developer
work.description: • Look for improvements to the code .• Analyze and build software solutions.• Optimization and maintaining web applications.• Solve issues spotted by the QA team.

work.title: Freelancer FullStack Developer
work.description: specialist on web developing ground and got a profound knowledge of doing anything related to this platform. Also, I have got an impressive urgency of learning and gaining new skills and knowledge with total ease.

testimonials.text: Juan Mario is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Juan Mario has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
